item.title: Report E-2024090079
item.description:
Report E-2024090079

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-05
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release. ERTS dispatched a contractor to assist with clean up. Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 5ft-by-3ft area of the trailer floor and a 2ft-by-2ft area of concrete underneath the trailer and estimated that one (1) quart of material was released. Clean Harbors personnel moved all the cans from the pallet to verify the damage, deployed oil dri, and then cleaned the released material. The damaged cans and recovered material were placed into three (3) 55-gallon poly drums and was staged onsite at the terminal prior to the contractor demobilization.
